name: Access Control Policy
description: Establish and maintain an access control policy that addresses purpose, scope, roles, responsibilities, and compliance.

name: Account Management
description: Establish and maintain account creation, modification, review, and termination procedures.

name: Least Privilege
description: Employ the principle of least privilege and restrict access to physical and logical assets and associated facilities to authorized users.

name: Risk Assessment
description: Conduct periodic risk assessments to identify and prioritize risks to organizational operations and assets.

name: Security Awareness Training
description: Provide security awareness training to all personnel upon hire and at least annually thereafter.
